Mumu:
f You turn left from the entrance of the city, you will get to the area of warehouses and retail shops.
Right live displaced persons from the Village of Elves.
On the platform we can see the Tower of the Ancient high house. There are the bravest warrior of the tribe of cats - PAL!
Well and in the end... In the center of the city there is the Central axis, supporting the city. But the last time she expels dark energy and strange creatures. They do not allow You to get closer to this place.
